item.text: Now the apostles and the brothers who were throughout Judea heard that the Gentiles too had accepted the word of God.

<st data-num="1161" class="">So</st> <st data-num="3753" class="">when</st> <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st> <st data-num="305">went up</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2419" class="">Jerusalem</st>,<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="4061">circumcised</st> believers<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1252">took issue</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">with</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>,

<st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>, “You <st data-num="1525" class="">went</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="203" class="">uncircumcised</st> <st data-num="435" class="">men</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4906">shared a meal</st> with<n id="2" /> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>.”

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st> <st data-num="757">began</st> and <st data-num="1620" class="">explained</st> it to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="2517" class="">point by point</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>,

“<st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="4172" class="">city</st> of <st data-num="2445" class="">Joppa</st> <st data-num="4336" class="">praying</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> a <st data-num="1611" class="">trance</st> I <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> a <st data-num="3705" class="">vision</st>,<n id="1" /> an <st data-num="4632" class="">object</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">something</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> a <st data-num="3173" class="">large</st> <st data-num="3607" class="">sheet</st> <st data-num="2597" class="">descending</st>,<n id="2" /> being <st data-num="2524">let down</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st><n id="3" /> by its <st data-num="5064" class="">four</st> <st data-num="746" class="">corners</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> it <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> <st data-num="891" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>.

As I <st data-num="816" class="">stared</st><n id="1" /> I <st data-num="2657" class="">looked</st> <st data-num="1519">into</st> <st data-num="3739">it</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="5074">four-footed animals</st> of the <st data-num="1093" class="">earth</st>, <st data-num="2342">wild animals</st>, <st data-num="2062" class="">reptiles</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3772">wild</st> <st data-num="4071" class="">birds</st>.<n id="3" />

I <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> a <st data-num="5456" class="">voice</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st> to <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>, ‘<st data-num="450">Get up</st>, <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter;</st> <st data-num="2380" class="">slaughter</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2068">eat</st>!’

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> I <st data-num="2036" class="">said</st>, ‘<st data-num="3365">Certainly not</st>, <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st>, <st data-num="3754">for</st> <st data-num="3763" class="">nothing</st> <st data-num="2839" class="">defiled</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> ritually <st data-num="169" class="">unclean</st><n id="1" /> has <st data-num="3763">ever</st> <st data-num="1525" class="">entered</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="4750">mouth</st>!’

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> the <st data-num="5456" class="">voice</st> <st data-num="611" class="">replied</st> a <st data-num="1208">second time</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st>, ‘<st data-num="3739">What</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> has made <st data-num="2511" class="">clean</st>, <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> must <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> consider<n id="1" /> ritually <st data-num="2840">unclean</st>!’

<st data-num="3778" class="">This</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">happened</st> <st data-num="5151">three times</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> then <st data-num="537" class="">everything</st> was <st data-num="385">pulled up</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st> <st data-num="3825" class="">again</st>.

<st data-num="2400 1824">At that very moment</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="5140" class="">three</st> <st data-num="435" class="">men</st> <st data-num="649" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="2542" class="">Caesarea</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2186" class="">approached</st><n id="3" /> the <st data-num="3614" class="">house</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">where</st> we <st data-num="1510">were staying</st>.<n id="4" />

The <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> <st data-num="3004">told</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> to <st data-num="4905" class="">accompany</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="3367" class="">without</st> <st data-num="1252" class="">hesitation</st>. <st data-num="3778" class="">These</st> <st data-num="1803" class="">six</st> <st data-num="80" class="">brothers</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">went</st> <st data-num="4862" class="">with</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> we <st data-num="1525" class="">entered</st> the <st data-num="435">man’s</st> <st data-num="3624" class="">house</st>.

He <st data-num="518" class="">informed</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="4459" class="">how</st> he had <st data-num="1492" class="">seen</st> an <st data-num="32" class="">angel</st> <st data-num="2476" class="">standing</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3624" class="">house</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004">saying</st>, ‘<st data-num="649">Send</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2445" class="">Joppa</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3343" class="">summon</st> <st data-num="4613" class="">Simon</st>, who is <st data-num="1941" class="">called</st> <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st>,

<st data-num="3739" class="">who</st> will <st data-num="2980" class="">speak</st> a <st data-num="4487" class="">message</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">which</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">entire</st> <st data-num="3624" class="">household</st> will be <st data-num="4982" class="">saved.’</st>

<st data-num="1161" class="">Then</st> as <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="757">began</st> to <st data-num="2980" class="">speak</st>, the <st data-num="40" class="">Holy</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> <st data-num="1968" class="">fell</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="5618">just as</st> he did<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="746" class="">beginning</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">And</st> I <st data-num="3415" class="">remembered</st> the <st data-num="4487" class="">word</st> of the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="5613" class="">as</st> he used to <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st>,<n id="2" /> ‘<st data-num="2491">John</st> <st data-num="907" class="">baptized</st> with <st data-num="5204" class="">water</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> will be <st data-num="907" class="">baptized</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">with</st> the <st data-num="40" class="">Holy</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit.’</st><n id="3" />

<st data-num="3767" class="">Therefore</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1325" class="">gave</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> the <st data-num="2470" class="">same</st> <st data-num="1431" class="">gift</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="5613" class="">as</st> he <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> gave <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> after <st data-num="4100" class="">believing</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1909" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>,<n id="4" /> <st data-num="5101" class="">who</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> to <st data-num="2967" class="">hinder</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>?”
When they heard this, they ceased their objections and praised God, saying, “So then, God has granted the repentance that leads to life even to the Gentiles.”
Now those who had been scattered because of the persecution that took place over Stephen went as far as Phoenicia, Cyprus, and Antioch, speaking the message to no one but Jews.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> there <st data-num="1510" class="">were</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">some</st> <st data-num="435" class="">men</st> from <st data-num="2953" class="">Cyprus</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2956" class="">Cyrene</st><n id="2" /> among them <st data-num="3748" class="">who</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1519">to</st> <st data-num="490" class="">Antioch</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> began to <st data-num="2980" class="">speak</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="1675" class="">Greeks</st><n id="5" /> too, <st data-num="2097" class="">proclaiming the good news</st> of the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">The</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="5495" class="">hand</st> of the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, <st data-num="5037" class="">and</st> a <st data-num="4183" class="">great</st> <st data-num="706" class="">number</st> who <st data-num="4100" class="">believed</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1994" class="">turned</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1909" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st>.

A <st data-num="3056" class="">report</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4012" class="">about</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="191" class="">came</st> <st data-num="1519">to</st> the <st data-num="3775" class="">attention</st><n id="2" /> of the <st data-num="1577" class="">church</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2419" class="">Jerusalem</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> they <st data-num="1821" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="921" class="">Barnabas</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="2193" class="">to</st> <st data-num="490" class="">Antioch</st>.<n id="5" />

When<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3739">he</st> <st data-num="3854" class="">came</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> the <st data-num="5485" class="">grace</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, he <st data-num="5463" class="">rejoiced</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3870" class="">encouraged</st> them <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> to <st data-num="4357">remain true</st><n id="2" /> to the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> with <st data-num="4286" class="">devoted</st> <st data-num="2588" class="">hearts</st>,<n id="3" />

<st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> he <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> a <st data-num="18" class="">good</st> <st data-num="435" class="">man</st>, <st data-num="4134" class="">full</st> of the <st data-num="40" class="">Holy</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> of <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> a <st data-num="2425">significant number</st> of <st data-num="3793" class="">people</st><n id="1" /> were <st data-num="4369" class="">brought</st> to the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st>.

<st data-num="1161">Then</st> Barnabas <st data-num="1831" class="">departed</st> <st data-num="1519">for</st> <st data-num="5019" class="">Tarsus</st> to <st data-num="327">look for</st> <st data-num="4569" class="">Saul</st>,

and when he found him, he brought him to Antioch. So for a whole year Barnabas and Saul met with the church and taught a significant number of people. Now it was in Antioch that the disciples were first called Christians.
At that time some prophets came down from Jerusalem to Antioch.

<st data-num="1520" class="">One</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, <st data-num="3686" class="">named</st> <st data-num="13" class="">Agabus</st>, <st data-num="450">got up</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="4591" class="">predicted</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1223" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> that a <st data-num="3173" class="">severe</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="3042" class="">famine</st><n id="4" /> was <st data-num="3195" class="">about</st> to <st data-num="1510" class="">come</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">over</st> the <st data-num="3650" class="">whole</st> <st data-num="3625">inhabited world</st>.<n id="5" /> (<st data-num="3748">This</st><n id="6" /> <st data-num="1096">took place</st> <st data-num="1909">during</st> the reign of <st data-num="2804" class="">Claudius.)</st><n id="7" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">So</st> the <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st>, <st data-num="1538" class="">each</st> <st data-num="2531">in accordance with</st> his <st data-num="2141">financial ability</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3724" class="">decided</st><n id="2" /> to <st data-num="3992" class="">send</st> <st data-num="1248" class="">relief</st><n id="3" /> to the <st data-num="80" class="">brothers</st> <st data-num="2730" class="">living</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2449" class="">Judea</st>.
They did so, sending their financial aid to the elders by Barnabas and Saul.
